name: PewDiePie: Legend of the Brofist
description: Join your favorite YouTubers on an Epic Quest in PewDiePie: Legend of the Brofist.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 400 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Port of the pretty simple mobile platformer game, full of 'dank maymays' and YouTube references (with really poor gameplay and terribad soundtrack). If you want to pour your local equivalent of 8 euros down the drain, this game is a perfect gift for your worst enemy or PDP-starved fanboy/fangirl.   +- mediocre pixel art - music - gameplay - 'hilarity'   1/10

Pros: The game is so short that you can beat it and get a refund Cons: Everything else in all honesty it feels like somebody tried to make a good platforming game, which in some areas, it is, but it's marred by the fact that in the beginning of the game, you can buy enough health to the point where you can run through every level without giving a damn about any enemy. Upsetting, people put EFFORT into this. Not the youtubers though, a lot of them sound like they phoned this in.
Gameplay
I paid $7 for this .............   'Update' Actually the game is not bad but in my opinion is not  worth $8 maybe on sale could be a better option

Alright for the first and second level then it just gets really boring, really quick! Plus some times you land on a barrel to kick its wooden ♥♥♥, but you go through him and get hit. Happened to me many of times, gets annoying!
Not much of an interesting story. Sure it's about one of the most famous YouTubers, but whatever.

I'm not really a fan of PewDiePie aside from the occasional vlog and his Twitter, but you needn't be to throughly enjoy this game.  The game has plenty of content and decent mechanics. It was fun for quite a while!
It's a fun and simple game, great soundtrack. its just short. Its still really fun even if you dont like all of the youtubers.
Love it soooooooooooo much! Buy this if: - You're a fan of Poodiepie - Like 2D pixel games - Or just have nothing to do with your life! (Like me)
game to quick but i still loved it

Surprisingly, this was a great play ( well still is). I have completed the game twice, on easy and medium. Each difficulty makes the game more challenging (to no-one's surprise) and with each level of difficulty, makes the game more fun. Maybe you want a relaxing 2D platformer with the easy difficulty or whether you want to play the Dark Souls of 2D platformers with 1 life pug mode.  This games story is ok. It is nice to see the well known Youtubers all come together in one game and fight along-side each other. The references are fun. However, it suffers from something that I call 'Mario Story Disease'. Main Villian steals something, Main character goes to get it back, goes through endless hords of enemies by jumping on them or killing them in any way, fights a variety of mini-bosses to get to main one, kills main boss, the end. That sums up the story. Its witty, but lacks a unique factor other that 'duuh, my fav utober is there, duuh'. That isn't unique Conclusion I would give this a game a: 8.5 / 10 - It is really fun - Controlls well - Got lots of recognisable faces - Likeable characters and lots of development - With some really good character development. However: - The story is predictable - Lacks the character development which I was expecting - Co-op is local ( I think) - Repetative after a while.  I have been BabyFace, and that is what I thought of Pewdiepie: Legend of the Brofist.
10/10 Would barrel again
The best indie game after Super Mario Bros

The game is surprisingly well made considering it's based off of a youtuber. The story is meh and kinda boring but the gameplay itself is fun and addicting. I really wish there were more levels, I got bored of playing the same ones all over again pretty fast, even on different difficulties.  + damn cry is a kawaii piece of ♥♥♥♥ in that cat costume man. made the game a lot more fun to play :^^)
How can i play this in my ipad?.
been a fan of pewdiepie for years now and tbh i've had my doubts about this game but i don't regret buying it one bit i actually rly love it

PewDiePie: Legend of the Brofist. Good Game. 8-Bit Graphics. Voice Acting Is Actually Pretty Good (MY OPINION) Level's Are Fun To Play. Bosse's A Little Bit Hard But Still Fun When You Beat Them. People Have Their Opinions And They Will Maybe Not Stay Like That.

Legend of the Brofist is cool. It will bring u that oldstyle run and jump, like Megaman (but without the shooting). Crazy things come at u from all sides, i mean like flying whales, cows blowing up and those damn Barrels! PewDiePie is cool and all, not a hardcore fan here, but this is hilarious even if u never ever seen the guy. 2 hour play time on easy mode. So full price will be a bit much (now going for 7,99), but in a Sale, just click buy!

I bought this game because I'm a big fan of PewDiePie, but... The gameplay is weird, especially jumping mechanics. There are times when you jump around enemy like crazy, and can't hit them. Characters tend to slide off platforms, they might also jump and reach the platform, but somehow not land on it (and fall to their death in most cases). This happened especially on holiday maps (Halloween, Valentine's Day and so on) Also, the gameplay is repetitive, you go from place to place, kill the boss after few arenas, and so on. Level designs are ok, but could be better. Artstyle and music are really nice. Voice acting is decent, I believe Markiplier did the best job. Extra note: I didn't play in Polish (I switched to English) but I can see why people are complaining about translation, looking only at achievements section. It's both bad and cringy. In the end, I give this game solid 4/10. It's not the worst, but could be (and should be) a lot better.
Whats My Opinion On This Game?No Words Can Describe...When I Saw Sean,I Said ''Im Done,Im Already In Love With This Game''  Its Worth The Money!
Many amazing references, a cast of lovable characters, and it even allows you to play as pugs at the end. Whomever dislikes this game seriously needs to live a little more.
DEFENINTLY RECOMMEND THIS GAME ITS FUNNY, AWESOME, A GAME YOU'D ENJOY ITS A MUST PLAY 10/10 MUST PLAY AGAIN, 10/10 F#@% IGN
This is addicting asf but gets more boring as you continue but overall great game
About 4 hours of gameplay. It's mediocre at best. It's up to you if you want to buy it or not.
really fun bought on pc and mobile always fun

I'm still shocked. I got 11 hours to this game.8 of those hours for acheivments. Now i wish the wii u had acheivments. This game is a must have for anybody. The art style and frame rate are great.80% of the acheivments took me 8 hours to get. THERES SO MUCH POST GAME CONTENT! All the levels are designed well... kind of. 4 levels were so long they were grueling. The halloween, christmas, and valentines day levels. The halloween is meh, christmas ones look innovative but are full of gimmicks...but the 'Love is in the Air' level is so grueling. I actually wNted to get over with it. This game ran at 1600x1200 60fps with only steam in the backround, and ran at 25 FPS while OBS recording at 60 fps. To give you an idea. While this game is short the replay value makes up for it in every way. One small problem is the dialogue. The writing is funny and nice, but the voice acting (CinnamonToastKen and Jacksepticeye specificly) sounds slightly rushed. The voice levels are all slightly different. Some voices are echoed and fast when they dont need to be. PROS MEH CONS Replay Value There is and adult joke with pewds and cry, Rushed voice acting Level Design Because im christian i didn't like it, but it Holiday levels characters didn't get offended. I just shut off my monitor General ------ fight on hard+ is  'I axept da kontrakt' for 30 seconds. honestly unfair frames  art style I'm not a pewdiepie fan and dont watch mature characters youtubers, so i didn't get all the refrences. short yet structered story humorous script 9/10 would buy, dont even wait for a sale, gte it now!
This game is awsome, love it <3 I really love the story, the music, animation everything. It`s nothing that i dont like about it.

pewdiepie legend of the brofist is a very fun and funny game. this game if you couldnt tell is a 2D retro platformer full of memes and fun challenges and if you have a friend like me it is a blast in local co-op  0.95 half-life's A.K.A 9.5 out of 10
9 bucks wasted for a 2 hour game   GG Poods
Gun mechanics: 9/10  Best FPS shooter available right now.  Overall: 5/7
Really appealing to people who enjoy a good platformer game! :)
I cringe to this crap.

I really don't like Let's Players all that much, but this game is decent.   A big con are the awkward controls, though. Controlling the character feels extremely awkward. Also, you might consider this an easy money milking machine.   On the other hand, you will get a decent platformer with moderate difficulty, great graphics and sound as well as a few laughs if you're into the kind of humor the game presents.
cool
It's really fun to play but if you are going to have a good experience you got to have to controllers and offcourse someone to play with.

I personally don't understand why so many people dislike this game. I think it's challenging, funny and entertaining, and I'm not actually a very big fan of PewDiePie yet I still enjoyed it. I enjoy playing as my favourite gaming YouTuber (Jacksepticeye) and I think the voice acting is very good, considering they are   not   professional voice actors. Obviously the voice acting isn't going to be the best in the world. They are commentators, not actors.  Would I recommend this game? Yes. It's great fun and a great little time killer.  Pros: -Challenging -Funny -You can play as different characters -The music is awesome!  Cons: -Sometimes the character you are playing as does not respond when you move it (this is on keyboard, not sure about controller)

First Off all i dont know why everyone is complaining about this game. Its random and fun as hell. Its challenging aswell.  I saw someone complain about graphics. Realy guys? You must be like 10yo if you think thinks this is bad.  This hits me right in the child hood with a touch of radness.  One of the best Platform games by far. I dont mind it being short because i knoiw new levels can be add with the updates  Stay awesome Bros

This is game is actually good, it's so weird that it is. I don't like pewdiepie that much and I still enjoyed the ♥♥♥♥ out of this game, if I had one colmplaint, I'd say it's a little short. But they are adding new levels so yeah it's worth it if you like platformers. Genuinley good platformer that has a lot of charm and great music, the music my god, ♥♥♥♥ing awesome. Just buy the game if you want to, it's fun.

While the voice acting isn't that good and the platforming (for the most part) is rather simple, this game is still tonnes of fun with multiple upgrades, characters and just the overall silliness of the story. Not a deep experience by any means but a fun one nonetheless.

It's a nice game that mixes old school platomers such as Megaman, Super Mario and Spyro into one. The variety of levels is pretty high and the gameplay can be challenging on higher difficulty levels. Also important to mention that there are no microtransactions embedded meaning that once you paid for it the developers won't try to rob you from more money.   P.S.: about the freezes, I never experienced anything like that at all.

Many of the haters of this game havent played very much of it. Look at their play times. I honesty think that this is a fun game for both fan of Pewdiepie, or people who have never heard of him. Although it is full of inside jokes and sometimes cringy voice acting, it is the gameplay that truly dictates how good a game is.
I really enjoy this game. Is a great way to throwback to the olden days!!!! aka DKC reference in level 3 and yeah!!!
Really good game. I live it.

This was an actually well thought of game. The developers created something fun and enjoyable, if you like platformers and quirkyness. If you like Pewds, or like for a game to not take itself serious that just wants you to have fun, then you will enjoy this game. Also now that you can do co-op it adds even more fun to the game. The game was fun to play on my Android, and even more fun now that I can play it on Steam, and with friends.
this game was awsome
the game is very funny

I haven't finished the game yet (I can't wait to unlock Cry *-*) but I can already say that it's awesome ! It's a beautiful little game, with nice visuals and great music, and the characters really capture the spirit of what make us fans love you guys. The only (very small) thing that bugs me with the game is the fact that I can't customize my controls. The arrows definitely aren't for me. Would it be possible to have an update to change that ? Other than that, KUDOS to the guys and gals at Outerminds and to our lord and Senpai Poods for this amazing game !

Had a big massive smile on my face while playing this. Not only does it have youtubers that I love and have brought such happy times into my life. But the music and game play are pretty amazing too! Reminds me of some of my favourite childhood games. Outerminds have done such a good job on this.
Everyone hates this because of the title. Its not a bad platformer and its cheap so who cares?
Love the game, Love Computer's, perfect combination. Thanks outerminds!
The pinnacle of game design. We've done it. No further games need to be made after this one.

Got the game on iOS and now on PC.... very funny game. Very fun. So good to play when you wanna chill and have a few good laughs. Definitely a unique kind of game. Very well made. I don't watch the pew pew guy on YouTube, but I get his humor and enjoy the game anyways, even if there are inside jokes or characters I don't know that are from his life/channel.
